content: sarabeth is the fifth floral granny square in the welcoming blanket 1 a mystery crochet along for a throw blanket made up of nine 12 floral granny square patterns with borders sarabeth has a 5-petal flower at the center which is inspired by large flower in the flirty flowers hat pattern by frauke kiedaisch 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the back loop only includes a link to video tutorial crocheting in chain spaces crocheting in third loop includes video tutorials special stitch pattern bob includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** 12 30 5 cm square **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *approximately 80 yd 73 m in ca 90 yd 82 5 m in cb and 40 yd 36 5 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* clover amour us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* yarn needle **gauge** motif = 12 30 5 cm square *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/05/24/welcoming-blanket-crochet-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2017/08/08/crochet-pattern-flirty-flowers-hat-by-frauke-kiedaisch/ 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/06/28/crochet-pattern-sarabeth-floral-granny-square/
